Here is how to block tropico4.exe from being able to go online.

open your start menu and type CMD press enter.

if you get a UAC pop up allow it.

now in the cmd window (white text on black background)

copy the line below 
netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name=Tropico4In dir=in action=block program=â€C:\Program Files (x86)\Kalypso Media\Tropico 4\Tropico4.exeâ€ enable=yes

right click in the cmd window 'paste'
press enter.

copy the line below 

netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name=Tropico4Out dir=out action=block program=â€C:\Program Files (x86)\Kalypso Media\Tropico 4\Tropico4.exeâ€ enable=yes

right click in the cmd window 'paste'
press enter.

tropico4.exe has now been stopped from accessing the internet. 

enter serial number from keygen provided with torrent, enjoy.

Okay It's Time for me to help you guys..
first of all, kudos to extremezone :)

Now, I'll help you about the connection problem.

What you must do is.

 Open Control Panel\Windows Firewall\Advanced Settings\Outbound Rules...

Click New RULE

Select Program click next

Select "this program path" then look for
program files > kalypso media > Tropico 4.exe then select the .exe

default should be block connection, click next 

then by default everything is checked then click next 

then for the name. just type tropico.

start the application, type in serial then PLAY :)

For the serial, its in the fairlight folder.

To easily disable your internet and start it when you're done create a simple bat file and use it to run the game

content something like:

ipconfig /release
cd "C:\Program Files\Kalypso Media\Tropico 4"
tropico4.exe
ipconfig /renew


(of course change the path to your install folder)
